snippet: The pianist Barry Harris; the drummer Jimmy Cobb; the trumpeter Jimmy Owens; and the saxophonists George Coleman and Jimmy Heath will play Flushing Town Hall....
lead_paragraph: The pianist Barry Harris; the drummer Jimmy Cobb; the trumpeter Jimmy Owens; and the saxophonists George Coleman and Jimmy Heath will play Flushing Town Hall.

headline.main: The Old (Jazz) Masters, They Keep Getting Better
headline.print_headline: Music; The Old Masters, Getting Better
